name: @victronenergy/node-red-contrib-victron
description: Custom Node-RED Nodes for Victron Energy

scripts.release: git tag -d v$npm_package_version; git tag v$npm_package_version && git push --tags && git push && npm run create-release
scripts.documentation: bash -c '( sed "/^<!--/q" src/nodes/config-client.html && node scripts/service2doc.js -s src/services/services.json -r src/nodes/victron-nodes.html -t nodered ) | sponge src/nodes/config-client.html'
scripts.wiki: bash -c 'node scripts/service2doc.js -s src/services/services.json -r src/nodes/victron-nodes.html -t md | sponge ../node-red-contrib-victron.wiki/Available-nodes.md'
